ej,kampa101,P,pfirc901,Called third strike Alex Kampouris ejected by HP umpire Cy Pfirman

Kampouris' pop to second was dropped by Cuccinello but was ruled an infield fly.  Riggs was also out when after reaching second, he wandered off the base thinking he had been forced out.  Warstler tagged him for the double play.
$Off Schott's hand.  Schott tried to throw to first underhand with his injured hand but the ball went several feet over Scarsella's head.  Schott's injured hand force him to leave the game.
$Ethan Allen fell trying to get back to 2B

ej,jurgb101,P,searz901,Fighting ej,campg101,P,searz901,Fighting $as Billy Jurges stepped to HP, Gilly Campbell threw down his mask, chest protector and glove and attacked Jurges; this was a continuation of a fight between the two on 8/24 in Chicago at 2B; both players ejected by HP umpire Ziggy Sears; Campbell was taken to the clubhouse by an escort of teammates; Jurges left alone but a number of teammates ran to escort him off the field; Campbell dressed and went to a broadcast booth to talk about the fight
$catcher Dee Moore pitching for the Reds
